text: Condolences to the families and friends of those that died in the #BridgeCollapse. May the Lord of peace be their comfort!
"@chiefntshingila: Poor truck driver #ScapeGoat for the #BridgeCollapse pic.twitter.com/fVPkcYTHnt"
#BridgeCollapse #MH370 - on a given day, you can meet ever so many strangers and friends. Just leave them to talk! And what they believe!
